category-def.name: com.ibm.biginsights
category-def.label: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights
category-def.description: The IBM InfoSphere BigInsights Eclipse tools enhance your Eclipse development environment with capabilities for developing and deploying applications to the BigInsights server and writing programs using Java MapReduce, JAQL and Hive. They also support developing text analytics programs, such as extractors, that run on InfoSphere BigInsights.
